recipe.title: Home made Carmen Bars
recipe.ingredient: 1 1/2 cups nuts/seeds/dried fruit of your choice
recipe.step: Heat oven to 180C and line a slice tray with baking paper.
In a bowl mash bananas, then mix in egg, vanilla, peanut butter and sugar.
Pour in muesli, nuts, seeds, dried fruit and mixed spice and stir until completely combined.
Pour into tray and push flat with wet hands.
Place in oven for 20 mins or until lightly golden on the top.
Place on cooling rack still on grease proof paper.
Wait 8 minutes then cut into bars.
Wait until completely cold before serving.
